texts.biography: Taloc is a magical vengeful reactive spirit. He does not believe in the ferocity of an offensive spell, but in consistent protection and even more in effective retaliation.
texts.name: Taloc

specialty.description: Casts Magic Mirror with effect increased by 10% for every n hero levels (n - target creature level).
specialty.name: Magic Mirror
specialty.tooltip: Casts Magic Mirror with effect increased by 10% for every n hero levels (n - target creature level).
